entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7 except minus 13 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 13 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
